q: what's the benefit of this activity
pred: The activity of playing soccer on the beach has several benefits. First, it allows people to enjoy the outdoors and engage in physical activity, which is essential for maintaining good health and fitness. Second, playing soccer on the beach provides a unique and enjoyable experience, as the sand adds an extra layer of challenge and excitement to the game. Third, playing soccer on the beach can be a social activity, as it brings people together to share a common interest and create lasting memories. Finally, participating in such activities can help reduce stress and promote mental well-being by providing a break from daily routines and allowing individuals to relax and unwind.
